# 赛斯书：心灵探险：赛斯修炼法

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/xinling-tanxian
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/xinling-tanxian
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install xinling-tanxian
xinling-tanxian <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g xinling-tanxian
xinling-tanxian <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
